definitions.text: concerned with actual use or practice
examples: he is a very practical person
the idea had no practical application

definitions.text: guided by practical experience and observation rather than theory
examples: a hardheaded appraisal of our position
completely practical in his approach to business

definitions.text: being actually such in almost every respect
examples: the once elegant temple lay in virtual ruin

definitions.text: having or put to a practical purpose or use
